com.squidtopusstudios.zerobitengine.refact.entity

Class EntityManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.squidtopusstudios.zerobitengine.refact.entity.EntityManager

  • public class EntityManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Entity manager built on the LibGDX Ashley entity management system. Each World has it's own instance.

        public void addEntity(ZbeEntity entity,
             java.lang.String type)
        Adds an entity to the world grouped by type
        Parameters:
        entity - ZbeEntity instance to add
        type - type to group this entity under. E.g. wall

      • getEntities

        public java.util.List<ZbeEntity> getEntities(java.lang.String type)
        Gets a List of entities identified by the type used to add them
        Parameters:
        type - type of entities to get
        Returns:
        List of entities identified by 'type'

      • getEntity

        public ZbeEntity getEntity(java.lang.String type)
        Gets the first entity of 'type' added to the World. Useful if you have a single entity type such as 'player'
        Parameters:
        type - type of entity to get (used in addEntity)
        Returns:
        the first entity identified by 'type'

        Called when the parent World is disposed

      • addSystem

        public void addSystem(ZbeSystem system)
        Adds a system to the Ashley engine instance. Use this to add your own systems
        Parameters:
        system - System instance to add
